metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17534 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: uiutil.c in Mensis 0.0.080507 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL, a different vulnerability than CVE-2017-17521.

criterions.comment: mensis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
